attributes.action: reconsider the abolition of the 10p tax rate from April 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst accepting the lowering of the 22p tax rate, the decision to scrap the 10p rate from April will effectively double the Income Tax from thousands of low paid workers.

To ensure the cost of living under this Government does not become too high for low paid workers. The 10p rate should be reintroduced.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
